# RailReach — Complete Station Journey Time Data

> Complete dataset of train journey times from 350+ UK stations to London terminals. Data sourced from National Rail timetables (2026). All times represent the fastest typical service.

## How to Read This Data

Each entry shows: Station Name → Terminal Name: XX minutes (direct/indirect)

## Kings Cross / St Pancras

- Finsbury Park → Kings Cross: 5 min (direct)
- Hornsey → Kings Cross: 9 min (direct)
- Alexandra Palace → Kings Cross: 12 min (direct)
- New Barnet → Kings Cross: 20 min (direct)
- Oakleigh Park → Kings Cross: 17 min (direct)
